NTCSF
11-12 October,2019

Number Theory, Combinatorics, & Special Functions

Symposia on Applied Mathematics and Engg. Mathematics

About the Conference

A conference on "Number Theory, Combinatorics and Special Functions" in honour of Prof. A. K. Agarwal is being organised by TIET, Patiala. The School of Mathematics and Computer Applications, Thapar University, is organizing the XII Annual conference of Society for Special Functions and their Applications. This Conference will provide a common platform for interaction, exchange of ideas and latest development in the field of Special Functions and various related fields of Mathematical Sciences. The day to day activities during the conference are designed to be interactive, involving sessions like plenary lectures, invited talks and paper presentation sessions, covering a wide range of topics including Fractional Calculus, Number theory, Combinatorics, Special Functions, Lie Theory, Orthogonal Polynomials, Q-Theory etc.

Call for Papers

The organisers of conference invite papers for presentations (Oral /Poster).

Important Dates

Last date to send abstract of papers (for contributed talk Oral/Poster) : September 03, 2019

Acceptance of contributed talk (Oral/Poster) : September 07, 2019

Last date to register (Oral/Poster/participation): September 10, 2019

Registration Fees

Participants (faculty): Rs. 3000
Students:Rs. 2500
Accompanying Person:Rs. 1500
Foreign Participants:$ 200

Speakers

  • Prof. A K Agarwal - Panjab University
  • Prof. S Bhargava - University of Mysore
  • Prof. S D Adhikari - HRI Allahabad
  • Prof. K Chakraborty - HRI Allahabad
  • Prof. U K Anandavardhanan - IIT Bombay
  • Prof. B N Waphare - Pune University
  • Prof. M A Pathan - Aligarh Muslim University
  • Prof. S N Singh - Dept. of Sci. & Tech.
  • Prof. A Dixit - IIT Ghandinagar
  • Prof. R Barman - IIT Guwahati
  • Prof. N Saikia - Rajiv Gandhi University
  • Prof. A Shukla - SVNIT, Surat
  • Prof. T Chatterjee - IIT Ropar
  • Prof. S N Fathima - Pondicherry University
  • Prof. K R Vasuki - University

Organizers

  • Dr. Meenakshi Rana
  • Dr. Jatinderdeep Kaur
  • Dr. Kavita Goyal
  • Dr. Amrik Sen

Contact
For further information, contact the local organizers at ntcsf2019@thapar.edu.
